name: gamess-ri-mp2-miniapp
description:
The GAMESS RI-MP2 mini-app computes the correlation energy with the
Hartree-Fock energy and wave-function given as inputs. The inputs were
generated from GAMESS.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Cray's MPICH is a high performance and widely portable implementation of
the Message Passing Interface (MPI) standard.

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description:
The Cray Scientific Libraries package, LibSci, is a collection of
numerical routines optimized for best performance on Cray systems.
